issue.title: Problems stopping all processes associated with ignition

content.raw: I just run the “./run.bash nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed tunnel\_circuit\_practice.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_1” example and nothing else \(no controller, no other container, just that one thing\). I tried to cancel it while it was still starting \(I think, its hard to tell when it is done\).
content.html: I just run the “./run.bash nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1” example and nothing else (no controller, no other container, just that one thing). I tried to cancel it while it was still starting (I think, its hard to tell when it is done).
